strings.Value: "Mother of Monsters doesn't give voice to simple critters. Gives fangs. Gives talons. Gives extra limbs. But not voice."
"I am afraid that the bird we met is a herald of another kind of evil. Perhaps Sarenrae herself sends me this ominous premonition as a warning."
"If you mean that raven, then the source of its capabilities could be not the goddess, but any spellbinder. I hope we won't have to deal with another follower of Lamashtu."
"You mean that winged rat in Varnhold? Just forget it! Should have kicked the life out of it when we had a chance!"
"There are many monsters besides the children of your goddess. Some of them are quite eloquent, and even polite!"
"There are many monsters besides the children of your goddess. Some of them are quite eloquent, and even polite!"
